page.title: 12LOCAL ISSUES PT.2
page.content:
{ Housing Estates:}There are plans to build 3 housing estates in Reydon to counteract the lack of low_cost housing. Part of the designated area is within the{Suffolk Heritage Coast {Preservation Area}containing sites of special scientific interest and areas of outstanding natural beauty. These houses would probably be bought by commuters,and some would become second homes.
{ Coastal Erosion:}There is extensive cliff erosion by the sea as the cliff is soft sand_stone.The coastline retreats several metres each year. {Easton Bavents used to be the most {easterly point of the British Isles: It is fast disappearing. Most major sea_defences stop just north of Southwold;only a little limited work is proposed for Easton Bavents.
